column4: Paper type (0 = review, 1 = empirical, 2 = meta analysis)
column8: Low SES sample? (1 = yes, 0 = no, 2 - mixed)
column9: Period of exposure (0 = prenatal; 1 = postnatal <3 years, 2 = mixed, 3 = preconception)
column12: Poverty measure (0 = education; 1 = income; 2 = SES (composite); 3 = neighbourhood; 4 = mixed; 5 = financial stress; 6 = social mobility; 7 = income-to-needs ratio
column13: Parental early-life adversity (0 = no, 1 = maternal, 2 = paternal, 3 = child, 4 = paternal + maternal)
column42: Child outcome - SGA (small for gestational age)

column7: Cambodia, Chile, Ghana, Guatemala, Lebanon, Pakistan, the Philippines and the USA
